progetto.network

Interface ISync

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGameSync, ClientGame, ServerGame, SyncStub

    public interface ISync
    This interface is used to connect the network to whatever we want to keep synchronized across the net. It is assumed that the sequence of string is enough to ensurer that the state of the object is unique.
